[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@idealeap/pipeline](./pipeline.md) &gt; [PipeOptions](./pipeline.pipeoptions.md)

## PipeOptions interface

Options for configuring a pipe.

The `PipeOptions` interface extends the `BatchOptions` interface, adding more configurations specific to pipes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PipeOptions<T, R> extends BatchOptions<T, R> 
```
**Extends:** [BatchOptions](./pipeline.batchoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, R&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [batch?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.batch.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ A flag indicating whether batching should be used. If <code>true</code>, the pipe will handle inputs in batches. |
|  [description?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.description.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ An optional description of the pipe. |
|  [destroyProcess?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.destroyprocess.md) |  | () =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ An optional function to clean up resources when the pipe is destroyed. |
|  [destroyProcessUse?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.destroyprocessuse.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The funcName of destroy processing. |
|  [errProcess?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.errprocess.md) |  | (error: any, context: [PipelineContext](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [MaybePromise](./pipeline.maybepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean&gt; | _(Optional)_ An optional function to handle errors that occur during the execution of the pipe. |
|  [errProcessUse?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.errprocessuse.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The funcName of error processing. |
|  [id](./pipeline.pipeoptions.id.md) |  | string | A unique identifier for the pipe. |
|  [inputs?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.inputs.md) |  | Record&lt;string, any&gt; \| string | _(Optional)_ The inputs for the pipe. This can either be a record (object) of named inputs, or a string representing a single input value. |
|  [params?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.params.md) |  | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | _(Optional)_ An optional set of parameters to configure the pipe's behavior. |
|  [postProcess?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.postprocess.md) |  | (result: R, context: [PipelineContext](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [MaybePromise](./pipeline.maybepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt; | _(Optional)_ An optional function to postprocess the result data after it's produced by the pipe. |
|  [postProcessUse?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.postprocessuse.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The funcName of postprocessing. |
|  [preProcess?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.preprocess.md) |  | (input: T, context: [PipelineContext](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [MaybePromise](./pipeline.maybepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | _(Optional)_ An optional function to preprocess the input data before passing it to the pipe. |
|  [preProcessUse?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.preprocessuse.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The funcName of preprocessing. |
|  [retries?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.retries.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The number of times to retry the pipe in case of failure. |
|  [timeout?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.timeout.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The maximum duration (in milliseconds) before timing out the pipe. |
|  [use?](./pipeline.pipeoptions.use.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ An predefined funcName. |
